pic1_alt: Candles lit for Diwali. The candles are on gold trays surrounded by maroon and gold flowers and glow warmly. A person's hand in the background is lighting more lights. Photo is attributed to Udayaditya Barua on Unsplash
pic2_alt: Horizontal bar chart of number of sales by product category. Clothing and apparal has the most with 2700, food has 2600, electronics and gadgets 2200, and footwear and shoes 1200. Household items, beuty, games and toys, sports products, furniture and pet care all have around 400. Office, stationery, books, auto, decor, veterinary and tupperware all have around 100. Hand and power tools has around 10. Plot by Bhushan Shelke
